Name: Hidden Lands - Spot the differences
About the game: Explore ancient floating worlds to find pieces of lost civilizations. Hidden Lands is a procedurally generated Spot The Difference game with beautiful artstyle and endless levels. Find the differences between 3d floating islands to restore their beauty and enjoy landscapes with a sublime marvelous design. Observe carefully these nature simulations and solve all the quest to unlock objects and discover magical civilizations. // Features *Easy to use *Infinite levels *Comfortable Zoom and Rotation *Share your favourite lands! *Dynamic and relaxing music
